title: PROJECT YI
body: i really love this PROJECT YI skin but can you make an offer for him so he can be like 1700 or 1650 pls{{champion:11}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
1820 RP skins go on sale after a couple of months at the 1350 RP price.
I don't know if he already got this discount, if he did then you'll have a lot to wait.

The problem is that Project Yi came out before they introduced that and they said that this will only affect future legendary skins(so currently the only legendary skin that will go on sale eventually is dragon trainer tristana)

This is correct - older legendary skins are still price protected at 1820 RP. DT Tristana will be the first 1820 RP skin that will be eligible for the early sale at 1350 RP. 

Full details for the discount changed can be found [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts).
